xml.body:
@r227@
ffor as myche as when I was with yowr grace last att yowr place
namyd Bekesborne the xviith off Novembre: Yowr grace dyd
mynyster unto me certen artycles Interrogatoreys. Unto whom
by cause. I then lakkyd tyme and leysur: Also I had nott
myne Answere so holy In memory: as I now have:
I then made answere : as I mygth remember: butt nott
so fully: so thorowly : as now I purpose to doo: havyng
the matter better In memory. Wherfor att thys presentt
tyme: I shall desyre yowr grace gracyusly to acceptt
thys: thatt here I now: doo send unto yowr grace. ffor
so perffytt and full an answere: as I have now In
remembrance: unto the Interrogatoreys then unto me mynysteryd
ffyrst so ffar as I doo know or ever mygthe here off : All
or most partt off the artyclys a yenst Mr Rydley and Mr
scory presentyd: were provyd: yff they were not yett I am
assuryd to say thatt enowg wyll say thatt they were by them prechyd
